text.jpText: ふぅ～～、ばたばたの年末……\n『師が走る』とはよく言ったものです。
text.enText: Haaah～ the bustle of the year ending… \nOne could say it sounds like the "months have run out".

text.jpText: ね！　嬉しい悲鳴ってやつだけど、\nレースにライブに他の仕事に……\nもう目が回りそう！
text.enText: Right! I love it but thinking of all the races and lives and \nall the other work… it's making me dizzy already.

text.jpText: ふふふ、それだけじゃないでしょ？\n神社のお手伝いも……！
text.enText: Hehehe, you forgot something, you know? \nOur helping out at the shrine…!

text.jpText: そうそう！\nなんとかあの神社を綺麗にして、\n初詣を盛り上げなきゃね！
text.enText: That's right! I really want to polish up that shrine \nsomehow and liven up everyone's new year's visits.

text.jpText: うん！\n『ウマ巫女参り』も、絶対成功させようね！\n私とキタちゃんなら、きっとやれるよ♪
text.enText: Yes! And we have to ensure the success \nof the "Shrine Horsemaiden Homage"! \nI know you and me can do it♪

text.jpText: 次回、ウマ娘プリティーダービー\n『Happy new future ～朝焼けの絆～』
text.enText: Next up in Uma Musume: \nHappy new future ～Bonds Dyed in the Sunrise～

text.jpText: あっ！　スぺさんとグラスさん、\nそれにスイープさんも手伝ってくれるって！
text.enText: Ah! Spe and Grass said they would help out! So did Sweep!

text.jpText: わぁ、それは心強いね！\nお三方がいれば…伝統を重んじた、\nマジカルで食べ放題な、新しいお正月が…！
text.enText: Nice, that's reassuring! \nWith three people helping out… a novel, traditional, \nmagical, all-you-can-eat new year awaits…!
